name: The Magnificent Ferengi
description: The pursuit of profit meets the quest for glory as the Latinum Lot ride once more! But good intentions may land them at the business end of a bat'leth - unless someone can help them!
rules:
-- Unique Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Gaila, Leck, Nog, or Ferengi will provide a bonus to Supply Missions.
-- Every Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Community Rewards are only available during Phase 1. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Gaila, Leck, Nog, or Ferengi
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Supply Missions!

featured_crew.name: Rios
featured_crew.flavor: Rios finally found a place he felt at home on Earth in the 21st century. He stayed to create a better future.

featured_crew.name: Leck
featured_crew.flavor: Ferengi eliminator who cared more for combat than currency. He called out Quark’s attempt to cheat him, but also asked to join future jobs.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Nog
rewards.flavor: Nog became the first Ferengi member of Starfleet, and was assigned to DS9 as part of his cadet field studies.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Credits

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Rios
rewards.flavor: Rios finally found a place he felt at home on Earth in the 21st century. He stayed to create a better future.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Rios
rewards.flavor: Rios finally found a place he felt at home on Earth in the 21st century. He stayed to create a better future.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

adventures.name: Tagged to Move
adventures.description: Craft sensors that can be used to beam the goods back.

rewards.name: The Magnificent Ferengi
rewards.flavor: Event Victory Points

adventures.name: Tagged to Move
adventures.description: Craft sensors that can be used to beam the goods back.

adventures.name: Attune Your Sensors
adventures.description: Scan for signs of cloaked Klingon vessels.

adventures.name: Detect the Threats
adventures.description: Analyze and detect threats on and around the freighter.

rewards.name: The Magnificent Ferengi
rewards.flavor: Event Victory Points

rewards.name: Leck
rewards.flavor: Ferengi eliminator who cared more for combat than currency. He called out Quark’s attempt to cheat him, but also asked to join future jobs.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

goals.flavor: Show a little bravery with the Ferengi Alliance!

potential_rewards.name: Ferengi Alliance Transmission
potential_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Ferengi Alliance faction missions.

potential_rewards.name: Credits
potential_rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

goals.flavor: Score a lot of loot with the Ferengi Traditionalists!

potential_rewards.name: Ferengi Traditionalists Transmission
potential_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Ferengi Traditionalists faction missions.

rewards.name: Chronitons

goals.flavor: Do the honorable thing with the Klingon Empire.

potential_rewards.name: Klingon Empire Transmission
potential_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Klingon Empire faction missions.

potential_rewards.name: Credits
potential_rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

screens.text: "--and that's how I singlehandedly saved the galaxy last Convergence Day, I'm surprised you didn't hear about--oh, hello Captain, glad you could join us. We were looking for a sucke--I mean, a Starfleet officer who could lend us a hand. There's a 10% cut in it for you."

"I'm still not sure about bringing Starfleet here along, but Quark says you have an in with the Klingons. We'll need all the help we can get heading into the heart of Klingon territory, even if it will benefit them as well."

"Quark says he's been hired to hunt down missing Klingon artifacts, though he won't say by whom, and he swears he saw the Sword of Kahless aboard the freighter of a certain Klingon merchant. But that freighter's deep in Empire space right now."

"That's why we were hoping you could help us, Captain. This Klingon's no normal merchant. He deals in things even the most fearless Ferengi would never dare, to say nothing of the fact the Empire may not be too happy to see us. Think you can help us commit this caper?"

"--and that's how I singlehandedly saved the galaxy last Convergence Day, I'm surprised you didn't hear about--oh, hello Captain, glad you could join us. We were looking for a sucke--I mean, a Starfleet officer who could lend us a hand. There's a 10% cut in it for you."

"I'm still not sure about bringing Starfleet here along, but Quark says you have an in with the Klingons. We'll need all the help we can get heading into the heart of Klingon territory, even if it will benefit them as well."

"Quark says he's been hired to hunt down missing Klingon artifacts, though he won't say by whom, and he swears he saw the Sword of Kahless aboard the freighter of a certain Klingon merchant. But that freighter's deep in Empire space right now."

"That's why we were hoping you could help us, Captain. This Klingon's no normal merchant. He deals in things even the most fearless Ferengi would never dare, to say nothing of the fact the Empire may not be too happy to see us. Think you can help us commit this caper?"
